parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Wright, Queensland, 2010 and 2013.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: House of Representatives Standing: Economics from 25.10.10; Petitions from 4.12.13; Procedure from 4.12.13; Selection from 4.12.13; Appropriations and Administration from 13.5.2015.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Government Whip from 18.9.13 to 23.2.15; Chief Government Whip from 23.2.15.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Delegate, Nationals and Liberal National Party State Conferences (Qld) 2007-10.
Member, Liberal National Party Agenda Committee 2008-09.
Assistant to State Campaign Director, Liberal National Party (Qld) 2009.
Chair, Liberal National Party Transition Action Committee.
Chair, Liberal National Party Condamine State Electorate Council.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Chief of Staff to Senator BTG Joyce.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: south-eastern Queensland, to the south and west of Brisbane: it includes the centres of Aratula, Beaudesert, Beechmont, Boonah, Canungra, Forest Hill, Gatton, Harrisville, Hillview, Jimboomba, Laidley, North Ipswich, Rathdowney, Springbrook and Tamborine, and parts of Mudgeeraba and Nerang.
State electorates: Wright includes the Queensland Legislative Assembly electorate of Beaudesert and parts of Albert, Algester, Gaven, Lockyer, Logan and Mudgeeraba.
